metadata.title: CVE-2020-28025 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Exim 4 before 4.94.2 allows Out-of-bounds Read becausepdkim_finish_bodyhash does not validate the relationship betweensig->bodyhash.len and b->bh.len; thus, a crafted DKIM-Signature headermight lead to a leak of sensitive information from process memory.

criterions.comment: exim4: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
